column3: 26 base letters, but with their variations, 50 letters.
These 50 base letters then have various different forms totalling to 453 different Unicode characters.
The base letter is typed using the Ethiopic typer program then we press (Tab) to get a menu of the variant letters.
Fully supports the following Unicode blocks:
Does not support the following Unicode blocks:
There is a bug where space is sent before the characters starting from the tenth entry.
The correct syntax for fixing this bug is the character followed by the {Left 2}{BS}{Right} syntax.
{Left 2}{BS}{Right} syntax to be added starting from the tenth entry.
